Shadow Hounds are found in the Shadow Dungeon. They are encountered during the Desert Treasure quest, and they can be found throughout the Chaos Tunnels.

They tend to interfere when a player is using the poison-technique on Damis. After Desert Treasure, they are difficult to kill in the Shadow Dungeon unless a player is willing to fend off level 84 giant skeletons; they respawn fast and are present throughout the dungeon. The easiest place to kill Shadow Hounds is in the small round chamber leading off to the north-west of Damis's chamber. It contains a level 7 giant rat and one hound, and it provides a reasonably safe place away from the skeletons.
